name: Up for Grabs
overview: Do you like word games? Then you'll love Up for Grabs. Because it's fast paced, exciting and educational all at the same time. You've got to think fast. Because you have to grab the letters you want off the rotating cube before anyone else does. Then you'll need to place them in your playing area and build words as quickly as you can! But don't go so quickly that you aren't able to plan ahead. Those gray squares are double word scores and letters that don't make words count against you.
